remarks: The value of the rank function expressed recursively: the rank of a set is the smallest ordinal number containing the ranks of all members of the set.  Proposition 9.17 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
statement:
rankval3b $p |- ( A e. U. ( R1 " On ) -> ( rank ` A ) = |^| { x e. On | A. y e. A ( rank ` y ) e. x } ) $.
$d A x y $.
